creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: three panel striped shawl; side panels have same pattern of medium wide stripe; center panel has medium width striped; colors include black, purple, red, aqua and orange (in fine stripes only); fringed ends; woven red border; red stripes in center panel patterned with supplemental threads
title: Shawl
